original_text: When my father and my mother forsake me, then the Lord will take me up.
korean_text: 내 부모는 나를 버렸으나 여호와는 나를 영접하시리이다

sentences.original_text: When my father and my mother forsake me
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지와 어머니가 나를 버릴 때

sentences.original_text: then the Lord will take me up
